edu.kit.cm.kitcampusguide.applicationlogic.poisource
Class POISourceImpl

java.lang.Object
  edu.kit.cm.kitcampusguide.applicationlogic.poisource.POISourceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
POISource
public class POISourceImpl
extends Object
implements POISource

Realizes the POISource-component. a DefaultPOIDB is used to retrieve POIs.

Returns the single instance of this POISourceImplementation.

getPOIsBySection

public Collection<POI> getPOIsBySection(MapSection section,
                                        Map map,
                                        Collection<Category> categories)
Description copied from interface: POISource
Returns all POIs within a given MapSection, which belong to a given Map and a given Category. If one parameter is null it will be ignored.

Specified by:
getPOIsBySection in interface POISource
Parameters:
section - only POIs within this section will be returned.
map - only POIs on this map will be returned.
categories - only POIs belonging to at least on of this categories will be returned.
Returns:
a collection of POIs matching the given request parameters.

getPOIsBySearch

public List<POI> getPOIsBySearch(String searchTerm)
Description copied from interface: POISource
Returns all POIs matching a given search term. The POIs are ordered by relevance, the first entry is considered to be most important.

Specified by:
getPOIsBySearch in interface POISource
Parameters:
searchTerm - the text used for search
Returns:
an ordered List of POIs. If no result were found, the list is empty.

getPOIByID

public POI getPOIByID(String id)
Description copied from interface: POISource
Returns the POI matching a given ID.

Specified by:
getPOIByID in interface POISource
Parameters:
id - an ID.
Returns:
a POI or null, if no appropriate POI was found

getPOIsByBuilding

public Collection<POI> getPOIsByBuilding(Building building,
                                         Collection<Category> categories)
Description copied from interface: POISource
Returns all POIs in a building. Additionally, a category filter will be applied.

Specified by:
getPOIsByBuilding in interface POISource
Parameters:
building - a Building
categories - only POIs belonging to at least one of this categories will be returned
Returns:
a collection of POIs.
